meanings.definition: A book that provides information or guidance on a specific subject or location.
meanings.sent1: I always carry a guidebook when I travel to new places.
meanings.sent2: The guidebook for hiking trails in the national park is very informative.
meanings.sent3: The guidebook on how to train a puppy was so detailed, it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a guidebook, full of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The guidebook on gardening was so vivid, it felt like the flowers were blooming off the pages.

meanings.sent1: She will guidebook the team towards success with her leadership.
meanings.sent2: Please guidebook me on how to reach the nearest gas station.
meanings.sent3: He guidebooks his friends in choosing the best movies to watch.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seem to guidebook sailors on their journey.
meanings.sent5: His words guidebooked me through the difficult decision, like a beacon in the dark.
